parameters.subject: Your Richmond Tacky Lights Insider's Guide üéÑ‚ú®
parameters.message:
üéÑ Your Tacky Lights Guide is Ready!

Hi {{ $json.firstName }},

Thanks for requesting our Richmond Tacky Lights Insider's Guide! Your free guide is ready - here are your downloads:

üìç DRIVER'S INSIDER GUIDE (PDF)

All 61 locations organized by neighborhood, with exact parking spots and traffic timing from our experienced drivers.

Download Guide

‚úÖ PRINTABLE CHECKLIST (PDF)

Track which displays you've seen and take notes about your favorites!

Download Checklist

üó∫Ô∏è INTERACTIVE MAP

Click each location for details about parking, timing, and display features.

Open Map

What Makes Our Guide Different:

These aren't just addresses copied from the internet. Our drivers have been navigating Richmond's tacky lights routes for 15+ years. We know:

  • Where to park at Wendhurst without sitting in traffic for 30 minutes
  • Why you should avoid Pump Road between 7-8 PM
  • Which houses require walking vs. drive-by viewing
  • The optimal route through each neighborhood

This is real local knowledge you won't find anywhere else.

Want the VIP Experience?

Skip the driving, parking, and navigation - let us handle everything while you enjoy the lights in comfort!

Our Tacky Lights Tours Include:

  • Professional chauffeur who knows every route
  • Luxury transportation (limousine, SUV, or party bus)
  • Curated route hitting all the must-see displays
  • 2-3 hour fully guided experience
  • Stops at major displays (Wendhurst, Dawnridge Court, etc.)
  • Complimentary beverages
  • Perfect for families, date nights, or corporate events
Book Your Tour

üìÖ Tour Season Dates:

Thanksgiving Weekend (Nov 23) through New Year's Eve (Dec 31)
Most houses are lit from 5:30 PM - 10:00 PM
Peak viewing: 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM (expect crowds at major displays)
Tours available every night except Christmas Eve and Christmas Day.

Questions about specific locations? Just reply to this email - our team has driven every street on this list dozens of times.

Enjoy the lights!
The TNT Limousine Team
Richmond's Trusted Transportation Since 2008

P.S. Don't forget to check out Wendhurst (9716 Wendhurst Dr) - it's one of the most famous displays in the country with 200,000+ lights! Park at Wendhurst Elementary and walk 2 blocks. Arrive before 7 PM or after 9:30 PM to avoid the biggest crowds.

TNT Limousine
